attributes.action: Ensure that buildings built for people with disabilities have covered parking!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is so important that legislation is passed so that disabled people who use any type of vehicle are allowed to park undercover, so that they can alight in the dry.  Also that they can enter the building under cover too.
I am due to move into a new block of flats in Huntingdon, and I am a wheelchair user.  The planners did not want to have any covered parking and had no idea what it would mean for us wheelchair users.  If it rained, we would get wet, sometimes, very wet!  This should not happen.
